name: CubeJump (4n7ih3ld)
description:
CubeJump is a small 2D platformer. This game was created so that I could learn the basics of the game engine Godot and the associated programming language GDScript. In the end I decided to publish CubeJump and to develop it further.

I will always keep you informed about updates here. You can also visit my website, there I will post all updates again in German.

If you have any suggestions for improvement or found bugs, please let me know. Any criticism is welcome.

Control
  • "Esc" to pause the game
  • "A" to move left
  • "D" to move right
  • "E" to interact
  • "Space" to jump
